title: Readings
content:
The “Do” problems will help students prepare for class and do not have to be submitted. Optional problems (“Opt”) are also included for some topics.
The chapters are drawn from this text: Stickney, Clyde P., and Roman L. Weil. Financial Accounting: An Introduction to Concepts, Methods, and Uses. 10th ed. Thomson South-Western, 2003. ISBN: 0324183518.
